title: The Cannibal Killer:  Episode 68
itunes:subtitle: Darlington, north-east England.  It was a strange, unnecessary and unremarkable murder when 40 year old Alan Taylor strangled his friend after an early morning drinking session.  But the reasons for the killing included an opportunity to gain revenge f...
content:encoded:
Darlington, north-east England.  It was a strange, unnecessary and unremarkable murder when 40 year old Alan Taylor strangled his friend after an early morning drinking session.  But the reasons for the killing included an opportunity to gain revenge for a grisly murder, 8 years earlier, when a man killed and ate part of his girlfriend.  Her limbs and head have never been found.

In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast we tell the story and look at the appalling repercussions from the 1998 murder which are still being felt today. 

Enjoy the podcast and want more? Listen to 12 bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime 

Want to talk about the show or any other aspect of UK True Crime? Join over 900 others on our friendly facebook group today:  https://m.facebook.com/groups/1479468325433430
